sourcesContent:
import React from 'react'; import '../styles/tour-details.css' import {Container , Row , Col ,Form , ListGroup } from 'reactstrap' import {useParams} from 'react-router-dom' import tourData from "../assets/data/tours" import calculateAvgRating from '../utils/avgRtating'; import avatar from "../assets/images/avatar.jpg" const TourDetails = () => { const {id} =useParams() //this is an static data which will be used with API and load data from //database const tour = tourData.find(tour=> tour.id === id) const {photo,title,desc,price,address,reviews,city,distance,maxGroupSize} = tour ; const{totalRating,avgRating} = calculateAvgRating(reviews) //format date const options ={day: "numeric", month: "long", year: "numeric"}; return (<>

{title}

{calculateAvgRating==0?null:avgRating} {totalRating==0?( 'Not rated' ) : ( ({reviews.length}) )} {address}
{city} Rs. {price} /Per Person {maxGroupSize}
Description

{desc}

{/* ========= tour reviews section =========== */}

Reviews ({reviews ?. length} reviews)

1 2 3 4 5
{ reviews ?.map(reviews =>(
Allen

{new Date("01-18-2023").toLocaleDateString("en-IN",options)}

)) }
{/* ======= tour reviews section end =============== */}
); }; export default TourDetails;
